courses.desc: This course is a practical oriented training on Programmable Logic Controls and how Computerized Control System allows us to use computer software to supervise the operation of an automated process
courses.title: Programmable Logic Control (PLC) with Ladder Diagrams
All About Robotics (AAR)
courses.desc: The Course is targeted at young kids interested in areas of science, mathematics and engineering. Learners will be introduced to Robotics, the sensors used such as; Touch, IR, Light, Color, Gyroscopes, etc.

courses.title: 3D Printing and Digital Scanner Technology
courses.desc: This Course development Prepare students for careers being reshaped by 3D printing technology. By combining in-depth lectures and class discussions with exciting hands-on projects, students will gain the theoretical and practical knowledge they need to wield this transformative technology in the real world
